title: Rockman.EXE Movie: Hikari to Yami no Program
synopsis: Deep in the dark recesses of the UnderNet, Forte sleeps as he drifts aimlessly. In this cybernetic graveyard, a pulsating power re-awakens Forte, alerting him to a dangerous being shortly ahead. A haunting face appears amidst a massive bright purple blob, laughing directly at Forte. Cursing him, Forte finds himself powerless as the blob takes form, and captures him within its grasp!
voices: ['Kimura, Akiko', 'Nemoto, Keiko', 'Higa, Kumiko', 'Saiga, Mitsuki', 'Matsukaze, Masaya', 'Yuuki, Hiro', 'Jou, Masako', 'Fukuyama, Jun']
staff: [['Kato, Takao', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Aketagawa, Jin', ['Sound Director']], ['Oshiyama, Kiyotaka', ['Key Animation']], ['Capcom', ['Original Creator']]]
